Perry Miller Adato (1921 – September 16, 2018) was an American documentary movie producer and director and writer. She was born in Yonkers, New York.
Adato won an Emmy Award in 1968 for her first movie, '. She was also known for her movies ' in 1970. In 1980 she won an Emmy nomination for "Picasso-A Painter's Diary".
Adato died on September 16, 2018 in Westport, Connecticut at the age of 97.
